feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/AudioStateCue.ts: Emits audio cue messages for processing states but renders no UI.
frontend/src/components/CameraPreview.ts: Camera view component with startup retries, preflight checks, user‑friendly errors, fallback UI, and photo capture handling.
frontend/src/components/CameraStartupFal: Full‑screen prompt with CTA button to manually start the camera when automatic startup fails.
frontend/src/components/LiveAnnouncer.ts: Screen‑reader live region component for announcing status messages.
frontend/src/components/OrientationPromp: Full‑screen orientation warning prompting users to rotate to portrait with an assertive announcement.
frontend/src/components/PlaybackControls: Accessible playback control buttons for pausing, repeating, and adjusting TTS speed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using authentication state with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCaptureHaptics.ts: Provides a vibration helper for capture haptic feedback with safe fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status flags using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnDeviceOcr.ts: Implements an OCR hook that loads Tesseract.js from a CDN and recognizes text from image files with processing state and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientation.ts: Returns whether the device is in portrait mode by listening to resize and orientation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Wraps the Web Speech API to provide speech playback with controls for rate, pause, resume, cancel, and error tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for accessible color themes, focus indicators, and touch target sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
Camera-based screen that captures images, performs OCR, speaks results, and manages announcements, orientation, and playback controls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, plugins, and dark mode support.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state for an Android accessibility-focused OCR-to-speech app, including architecture notes, existing features, and known camera preview issues.
